parameters.name: record_id
parameters.description: The record id. Mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: port
parameters.description: The port number to monitor like 80. Mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: monitor_interval
parameters.description: Monitoring spacing.Ranged {60|180|360|}. Mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: host
parameters.description: The host from the http header like "www.dnspod.com". Mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: monitor_type
parameters.description: {http|https} The monitor type. Mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: monitor_path
parameters.description: The request path from the http header like "/". Mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: points
parameters.description: The points to use.Split by ",".You can choose it from the list of your own grade. Mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: keep_ttl
parameters.description: TTL won't be changed if this is set. Mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: sms_notice
parameters.description: "me" for the owner,and "share" for the shared users.Split by "," if there are more than one like "me,share". Mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: email_notice
parameters.description: Same as the sms_notice.

parameters.name: less_notice
parameters.description: {yes|no} Whether to just send one notice within one hour. Mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: callback_url
parameters.description: The callback URL.All the data will be sent to this URL when the IP is down.For more details,please see the directions.Optional parameter.

parameters.name: callback_key
parameters.description: The callback key.If "callback_url" is set up,you should set this up too for security.
